entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH ISOLATED RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
